Text:
United Tribes Technical College's welding program has been certified as an accredited test facility of the American Welding Society — making it the only such facility in the state.  Get our local education coverage delivered directly to your inbox. Bismarck Public Schools will stop providing busing for its Head Start program beginning next school year amid transportation staff shortages. Mandan Public Schools will consider closing Custer Elementary School at the end of the school year, according to a letter to parents obtained … Bismarck State College has topped its highest student headcount for the third straight semester, the college announced Wednesday. The University of Mary is set to build a new student residence hall as enrollment continues to climb. Get up-to-the-minute news sent straight to your device.
